summary: DataConverter throws an exception when handling null return types in activity methods. The JsonConverter rejects 'null' as an invalid type name, causing failures when activities are declared to return null.
userImpact: Activities returning null values fail with DataConverterException, preventing the use of null return types in Temporal workflows.
rootCause: JsonConverter.errorInvalidTypeName() rejects 'null' as a type name during deserialization, even though null is a valid PHP return type.
workaround: Restart the RR server after SDK update; issue may be resolved by ensuring latest SDK version is properly loaded.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved by restarting the RR server after SDK update. The root cause was likely a stale server process not using the updated SDK code.
keyQuote: problem still exists... Hhm. Yep. right now it's working ðŸ˜‚
